channel.title: Life on GDLP
channel.description: Recent content in Life on GDLP

item.title: everything I made in 2023
item.description:
I did a blog post over on The White Pube about everything I made in 2023 across text and video, and reflected on how I managed to do anything at all given the fact my POTS is twice as bad as it was in 2022.

I also want to put it out to the Internet: if you are looking to give someone a 1 day a week job relating to writing, editing, social media, funding, community building or [insert the idea you had after reading the blog post aboout all the things I’m capable of] please get in touch on gabrielle@gdlp.co.uk

item.title: my CV
item.description:
Gabrielle de la Puente, Liverpool

Writing, editing, curating, lecturing, chairing, consulting, teaching, mentoring, and just generally giving my opinion on stuff

ðŸ“• Poor Artists book coming out October 3rd, pre-order here

âœï¸ Agent: Milly Reilly @ Colwill & Peddle

ðŸŽ“ Studied BA Fine Art at Central Saint Martins

The White Pube est.2015

  • weekly reviews, essays & podcasts on art, games and other culture
  • See Instagram, Twitter, recently resurrected Youtube Channel
  • Podcast on Apple, Spotify + wherever you get your podcasts
  • Successful Funding Application Library
  • Selecting on the monthly Working Class Creatives Grant
  • Juror for John Moores Painting Prize 2023
  • ‘Chaotic Nightclub Photos: The Review’ published with Rough Trade Books 2023
  • ‘Ideas For A New Art World’ published with Rough Trade Books 2021
  • Critics Club school for criticism with Three Rivers, Bexley
  • Advice Columns Elephant and Dazed
  • 2018 Global Initiative Speakers at Rhode Island School of Design

Games

  • Juror on 2023 BAFTA Game Awards - Multiplayer category
  • Producer of Moon Games for Tour de Moon
  • Game writing on The Haven of Aves for David Blandy’s Lost Eons series
  • Teaching on Games Studies @ Leeds Beckett

Other writing

  • Column on Culture at Home for Elephant
  • A text about the People of the Salt for Vittles Cooking From Life series
  • Report on The Impact of Using Social Media as an Artist for Unlimited
  • Writing for Vittles Season 3
  • National Gallery commissioned a text of Eva Quantica

Curation

  • Founder of OUTPUT gallery 2018-2021
  • Co-curation of John Moores Painting Prize 2023
  • Assistant Producer at AIR for Tidal Twirlings, North Woolwich
  • Founder and co-curator of Little Man Gallery 2015-2017

Teaching

  • Tutorials & lectures at art schools internationally
  • Mentoring artists (on DYCP)
